text: @realDonaldTrump @CNN What a jackass! Go back to your cave and watch Fox News you ignoramus.  COVID-19 isn’t going away, no matter how much you wish it would. Keep your dumbass rants going, they just make you look like a fucking fool! The only thing going away is you come November!
